name: Trackdizzia
description:
An old-school-looking racing game where the track changes every 10 seconds! Enjoy 3 AI difficulty levels, 4 biome types, up to 50 simultaneous cars on track, and an infinite number of procedurally-generated racing tracks.

Made for Ludum Dare 51 (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/trackdizzia).
